entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning this evening. A few flurries near Lake Louise overnight. Snow level lowering to 2000 metres overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. A few flurries near Lake Louise early in the morning. Snow level 2000 metres rising to 2400 metres in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow after midnight. Snow near Lake Louise late in the evening and after midnight. Snow level 2400 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
